scripts.build: bun run --cwd packages/shared build && bun run --cwd packages/api build && bun run --cwd packages/worker build
scripts.dev: concurrently "bun --env-file=../../.env.dev run --cwd packages/api dev" "bun --env-file=../../.env.dev run --cwd packages/worker start:dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "bun run --cwd packages/api start" "bun run --cwd packages/worker start:prod"
scripts.clean: bun run --cwd packages/shared clean && bun run --cwd packages/api clean
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd packages/api lint && bun run --cwd packages/worker lint
scripts.test: bun run --cwd packages/shared test && bun run --cwd packages/api test && bun run --cwd packages/worker test
